resources.string: Select the bluetooth devices that should toggle car mode when they\'re connected/disconnected. If the list is empty, enable Bluetooth and restart the application.

Application that allows you to automatically start or stop car mode when a Bluetooth device is connected or disconnected.

All attempts to enable Bluetooth denied, please enable Bluetooth manually and restart the application.
